The pontiff Tuck:
Congratulations on your new profession, . Do not expect that your path will be strewn with roses. Going down the road of destiny, you will face many challenges. But do not let difficulties disturb your heart! The light will always come to you for help, remember this.
By the way, you look Monarch Flame Kekei , it can be found in the City Administration. Visit him. It will help you in the way of improvement. God be with you the blessing of Einhasad ...
